query:
WITH
        job AS (
          SELECT *
          FROM one_off_jobs
          WHERE deleted_at IS NULL AND id = $1
            AND ($2::text IS NULL OR tenant_id = $2)
          FOR UPDATE
        ),
        req AS (
          SELECT *
          FROM http_requests
          WHERE id = (SELECT request_id FROM job)
          FOR UPDATE
        )
      SELECT
        job.id,
        job.region,
        job.execute_at,
        job.timeout_ms,
        job.max_retries,
        job.max_response_bytes,
        req.id as req_id,
        req.method,
        req.url,
        req.headers,
        req.body
      FROM job
      JOIN req ON req.id = job.request_id
